articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Slack is retiring its status account on X - The Verge
articles.description: Slack is retiring its status account on X that previously shared updates about issues and outages on the platform. Other companies, like American Express and Air France, have also reduced their investment in X
articles.content:
Slack is retiring its status account on X
Slack is retiring its status account on X
 / The company wants to focus resources on those most widely used by our customers.
